requirement_tested: A frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A visitor interested in learning about the solar company's offerings.
user_goal: To view dynamically loaded content on the website without seeing any hardcoded information.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens her browser and navigates to the solar company's homepage. She expects real-time data rather than static placeholders.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the root URL of the website.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page loads successfully, and all sections begin fetching data from backend endpoints immediately.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Dynamic Content
narrative_steps.description: As the page finishes loading, Sarah sees actual company history, product listings, and news articles pulled from the backend instead of dummy text.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the content rendering after initial load.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All displayed content originates from API responses, confirming dynamic data fetching is functioning correctly.

requirement_tested: A backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using the specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer deploying the application for production use.
user_goal: To ensure the backend service establishes a secure connection to the PostgreSQL database using predefined environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: The developer runs the backend server locally to verify connectivity to the configured PostgreSQL instance.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server using npm run dev or similar command.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server initializes successfully and logs indicate successful database connection using DB_HOST, DB_PORT, etc., environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Querying Database Tables
narrative_steps.description: Upon startup, the backend queries essential tables like 'company_info', 'products', and 'news' to confirm active database communication.
narrative_steps.action: Monitor server logs during initialization.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Database queries execute without errors, verifying correct table access and data retrieval through established connection.

requirement_tested: A company introduction section displaying history, mission, and values
user_persona: A potential client researching the credibility of the solar company.
user_goal: To understand the company’s background, purpose, and principles by visiting the About Us section.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to About Us Section
narrative_steps.description: John clicks the 'About Us' link in the navigation menu to learn more about the company.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'About Us' navigation item.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page scrolls smoothly to or loads the About Us section with distinct subheadings: History, Mission, and Values.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Company Details
narrative_steps.description: John reads through each subsection carefully to evaluate whether the company aligns with his environmental values.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down and visually inspect content under each heading.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each subsection displays accurate textual content retrieved dynamically from the backend database.

requirement_tested: A product showcase section with detailed product information
user_persona: A homeowner looking to purchase solar panels for energy efficiency.
user_goal: To explore various solar products offered by the company and compare features before making a decision.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Product Showcase
narrative_steps.description: Emily visits the 'Products' section to see what solar solutions are available.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Products page or scroll to the Products section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A responsive grid layout presents multiple product cards with names, descriptions, prices, and images.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Specific Product
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by one panel model, Emily clicks its card to get comprehensive specifications.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific product card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a dedicated product detail page showing extended description, larger image, and pricing details.

requirement_tested: A news updates section displaying latest news and events
user_persona: An investor keeping track of developments in renewable energy startups.
user_goal: To stay informed about recent company milestones, partnerships, or press releases.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing News Updates
narrative_steps.description: David navigates to the News section to catch up on recent happenings at the company.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'News' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A chronological list or timeline of news articles appears, each with a title, date, summary, and optional thumbnail.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding Article Details
narrative_steps.description: Interested in a particular announcement, David clicks an article to read the full story.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a news article entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Either the article expands inline or redirects to a separate page with the complete content and imagery.

requirement_tested: A contact us page with fields for name, email, and message
user_persona: A prospective customer needing clarification on installation services.
user_goal: To reach out to the company directly through a web-based contact form.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Contact Page
narrative_steps.description: Lisa goes to the Contact page to inquire about residential solar installations.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Contact' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A clean contact form with labeled Name, Email, and Message fields loads instantly.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out Contact Form
narrative_steps.description: Lisa fills in her personal details and composes a question regarding pricing options.
narrative_steps.action: Enter name, valid email address, and a brief inquiry message into respective input fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Fields accept input normally, and the Submit button becomes enabled once required fields are filled.

requirement_tested: Lemon chiffon background color applied throughout the website
user_persona: A UX designer auditing visual consistency across platforms.
user_goal: To verify that the lemon chiffon background theme is uniformly implemented across all pages.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Homepage Background
narrative_steps.description: While reviewing the homepage, the designer checks if the base background matches the requested lemon chiffon tone.
narrative_steps.action: Open homepage and inspect CSS properties of body or main container element.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background color is set to #FFFACD (lemon chiffon) consistently across all top-level containers.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Subpages Consistency
narrative_steps.description: Designer moves between different sections to ensure no deviations in background styling occur.
narrative_steps.action: Visit About, Products, News, and Contact pages individually.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every visited page retains the same lemon chiffon background as defined in style guidelines.

user_persona: A brand manager ensuring adherence to corporate identity standards.
user_goal: To validate that UI components follow prescribed chocolate-themed styling.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Component Colors
narrative_steps.description: Brand manager reviews primary interactive elements like buttons, headers, and cards to match approved color palette.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect styles of key UI components using browser developer tools.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Component backgrounds, borders, and text utilize shades of chocolate (#D2691E) as specified in branding documents.

narrative_steps.title: Cross-Section Verification
narrative_steps.description: Manager ensures chocolate styling persists even when navigating through various site sections.
narrative_steps.action: Cycle through all major sections—About, Products, News, Contact—and repeat inspection.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Consistent chocolate coloring remains intact regardless of page context or viewport size.

requirement_tested: Responsive design compatible with desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A busy professional checking the website on their smartphone during commute.
user_goal: To seamlessly navigate and consume content on a small-screen device.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Site on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Using a mobile phone, Alex types the website URL into the browser to explore services.
narrative_steps.action: Access the website using a mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Website renders appropriately scaled for smaller screens, avoiding horizontal scrolling or tiny unreadable fonts.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting Across Sections
narrative_steps.description: Alex taps through menus and explores product cards to assess ease-of-use on mobile.
narrative_steps.action: Tap navigation items, product cards, and buttons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactions work smoothly; layouts adjust responsively, and touch targets are adequately sized.

requirement_tested: Navigation menu linking to each main section of the website
user_persona: A new visitor unfamiliar with the site structure seeking quick orientation.
user_goal: To easily jump between core areas of the website using intuitive navigation controls.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: Upon landing, Maria looks for clear guidance on where to find specific information.
narrative_steps.action: Look for the navigation bar positioned prominently near the top of the page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A clearly visible menu with links to Home, About Us, Products, News, and Contact is present.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Between Sections
narrative_steps.description: Maria clicks each menu option to confirm they lead to intended destinations.
narrative_steps.action: Click sequentially on each navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each click results in either smooth scrolling to anchor points or direct navigation to corresponding standalone pages.

requirement_tested: SEO-friendly page titles and meta descriptions for each section
user_persona: A digital marketer optimizing online presence for organic search traffic.
user_goal: To improve discoverability of the website through targeted keywords in metadata.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Meta Tags on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Marketer inspects source code to confirm presence of descriptive SEO metadata.
narrative_steps.action: Right-click and choose 'View Page Source' on the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: <title> tag reflects unique branding and keyword-rich phrasing; <meta name="description"> contains compelling snippet.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Other Pages’ Metadata
narrative_steps.description: Continuing audit, marketer verifies consistency of metadata across secondary sections.
narrative_steps.action: Repeat viewing source process on About, Products, News, and Contact pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each page has uniquely tailored <title> and <meta description> matching its topic and purpose.

requirement_tested: Accessibility compliance including keyboard navigation and screen reader support
user_persona: A visually impaired individual relying on assistive technology to browse websites.
user_goal: To independently navigate the website using only keyboard commands and screen reader software.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Keyboard Navigation
narrative_steps.description: Using only Tab and Enter keys, user attempts to traverse the main navigation menu.
narrative_steps.action: Press Tab repeatedly starting from top of page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Focus indicator moves predictably through actionable elements in logical reading order without getting lost.

narrative_steps.title: Activating Elements with Keys
narrative_steps.description: When reaching a menu item, user presses Enter to activate it.
narrative_steps.action: Focus on a navigation link and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Link behaves identically to mouse click—scrolling or redirecting accordingly.

requirement_tested: Contact form submission handling with validation and success/error feedback
user_persona: A cautious consumer wanting assurance that their inquiries are properly received.
user_goal: To submit a message confidently knowing the system will validate entries and provide clear feedback.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Empty Form
narrative_steps.description: Before entering anything, user accidentally hits Submit to test error handling.
narrative_steps.action: Leave all fields blank and click Submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inline error messages appear next to empty required fields indicating missing input.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Valid Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: After correcting mistakes, user submits a well-formed contact request.
narrative_steps.action: Fill all required fields accurately and click Submit again.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form disappears or disables temporarily, replaced by a thank-you message confirming receipt.

requirement_tested: Image optimization for fast loading of media assets
user_persona: A frequent traveler accessing the site over slow cellular networks.
user_goal: To experience minimal delays when browsing product images or news thumbnails.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Product Gallery
narrative_steps.description: User opens the product showcase expecting prompt display of numerous high-quality visuals.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the Products section and observe how quickly images render.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Images load progressively, appearing sharp yet optimized for bandwidth usage.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Browser Window
narrative_steps.description: Adjusts window width to simulate varying device resolutions.
narrative_steps.action: Gradually resize browser horizontally.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Images scale responsively, delivering appropriately sized versions based on current viewport dimensions.

requirement_tested: Structured data markup for improved search engine indexing
user_persona: An SEO specialist auditing rich snippets implementation.
user_goal: To confirm presence of structured data enhancing crawlability and SERP appearance.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Structured Data
narrative_steps.description: Specialist examines raw HTML for inclusion of JSON-LD script blocks defining entities.
narrative_steps.action: View page source and search for '<script type="application/ld+json">'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Found embedded JSON-LD objects conforming to Organization, Product, Article schemas where applicable.

narrative_steps.title: Validating Markup Syntax
narrative_steps.description: Runs extracted markup through Google’s Rich Results Test tool.
narrative_steps.action: Copy JSON-LD snippet and paste into validator interface.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Validator reports no syntax errors and recognizes intended schema types for enhanced indexing.
